title: ResumAI
description: ResumAI leverages LLMs to generate, analyze, and optimize resumes for job seekers. Features include PDF export, keyword matching, and recruiter feedback simulation.

title: C(ART) Classifier
description: A deep learning model to classify artworks and styles. Built with CNNs and transfer learning for robust performance.

title: ASL Interpreter
summary: Real-time American Sign Language recognition app.
description: A web app that uses TensorFlow.js and a webcam to interpret ASL gestures into text and speech, making communication more accessible.

title: LLM Inference Workload Optimization
summary: Optimizing LLM inference on custom hardware.
description: Research project focused on accelerating large language model inference using hardware-aware optimizations and quantization techniques.

title: Car Price Prediction
summary: Predicting car prices using ML models.
description: A regression-based machine learning project to estimate car prices from features like make, model, year, and mileage.

title: Stroke Prediction
summary: ML model for predicting stroke risk.
description: A healthcare analytics project using patient data to predict the risk of stroke. Includes data preprocessing and model evaluation.

title: House Price Prediction
description: A regression project to estimate house prices based on location, size, and amenities. Visualized with interactive dashboards.

title: Stock Price Prediction
description: A time series forecasting project for predicting stock prices using LSTM and ARIMA models. Includes data visualization.

title: Ant Colony Optimization (ACO)
description: Implementation of the Ant Colony Optimization algorithm for solving combinatorial problems like TSP and scheduling.

title: Flight Delay Prediction
summary: ML pipeline for predicting flight delays.
description: End-to-end ML pipeline using PySpark and Airflow to predict flight delays based on weather, airline, and historical data. Includes dashboards and REST API.

title: ETL Pipeline in Airflow
description: A data engineering project demonstrating ETL pipeline orchestration using Apache Airflow for automation and monitoring.

title: Research Paper: Abstract & Essence
description: A natural language processing project to extract and summarize the abstract and essence of research papers automatically.

title: PixelArt SDXL
description: A creative project using Stable Diffusion XL (SDXL) to generate pixel art from text prompts. Includes a web interface for user input.

title: Orion
description: Orion is a web-based platform designed to facilitate collaborative research, sharing datasets, and running experiments in the cloud.

title: All In Casino
description: A provably fair, on-chain casino with games like Poker and Blackjack. Built with Solidity, React, and Chainlink VRF for randomness.
